trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> class represents a schema class definition that is contained in the schema partition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.Save%2A> method must be called to commit the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass> object that was created to the underlying directory store.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the LDAP display name for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
context or ldapDisplayName is `null`.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the auxiliary classes of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that represent the auxiliary classes of the current schema class object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets the Common Name (CN) of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the CN of the current class object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Gets or sets the default <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> descriptor of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurity"></xref> object that represents the default security descriptor for the current schema class object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets a description of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains a description of the current class object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Releases the resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.
`true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object in the Active Directory Domain Services schema partition that matches a given directory context and name.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that specifies the LDAP display name of the schema class for the search.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object for the schema class that was found.
Returns `null` if the class was not found.
The object was not found.
context does not refer to a valid or , ldapDisplayName is an empty string.
context or ldapDisplayName is `null`.

Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection that contains all properties, including ancestor properties, of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
If the method is called on an unbound object instance, an empty <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection> collection is returned.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> collection of the properties of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref>, including ancestor properties.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the directory entry for the schema class.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is not a valid instance.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is defunct.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value that indicates if the current schema class object is defunct.
`true` if the object is defunct; otherwise, `false`.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the properties that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> must contain.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> objects that represent the properties that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object must contain.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets the ldapDisplayName of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that contains the ldapDisplayName of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

For more information, see the topic [LDAP-Display-Name](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/a_ldapdisplayname.asp) in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
Gets or sets the OID for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the OID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the properties that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> can contain.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaPropertyCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaProperty"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object can contain.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> class can contain.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that this class can contain.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that can contain this class.

An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that can contain this class.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
The context is an AD LDS configuration set and the AD LDS instance could not be found.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
Gets or sets the schemaIDGUID for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass.SchemaGuid%2A> is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights.
A <xref href="System.Guid"></xref> object that contains the schemaIDGUID for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
For more information, see the topic "schemaIDGUID" or "Schema-ID-GUID" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets or sets the schema class from which the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is derived.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object that contains the schema class from which the current schema class is derived.
`null` if no schema class was specified during the creation of the current class.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
Gets the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the LDAP display name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

Gets or sets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> type for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> value that contains the type of the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The specified type is not a valid <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.SchemaClassType"></xref> value (applies to set only).
